plot: An old boxer, who has lost everything, gets the chance to recoup his dearest possession. But first, he must win a last round, a fight in which loosing means death.
title: El Perdedor
plot_es: An old boxer, who has lost everything, gets the chance to recoup his dearest possession. But first, he must win a last round, a fight in which loosing means death.
plot_en: An old boxer, who has lost everything, gets the chance to recoup his dearest possession. But first, he must win a last round, a fight in which loosing means death.
